item.title: amazon ec2 绑定多ip
item.description: <p class="p4"> <p class="p2"> <span class="s1"><b>Step 3:</b> Now navigate to &#8220;Network Interfaces&#8221; from the menu on left. Right-click on the network interface of your new instance, and select &#8220;Manage Private IP Addresses&#8221;.</span> </p> <p class="p4"> <p class="p2"> <span class="s1"><b>Step 4:</b> Click on the &#8220;Assign new IP&#8221; link in the &#8220;Manage Private IP Addresses&#8221; window. A new line should appear which says &#8220;Auto-assign&#8221;. Now click on &#8220;Yes, Update&#8221;. Take a note
